hero.title: Connect to Solar Parks and Save 36%
hero.description: Neos allows you to purchase energy directly from large solar parks. Reduce your emissions and costs without any installation, instantly and effectively.

process.title: The Neos Process
process.subtitle: Unlike rooftop installations, which can take up to 6 months, Neos instantly connects you to solar park energy.

calculator.title: Calculate Your Impact
calculator.subtitle: With a Neos subscription, your company can achieve the following goals:

advantages.title: Advantages
advantages.subtitle: Neos users benefit from clean and affordable solar energy. By connecting to solar parks, we achieve economies of scale, further reducing the price.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle:
We provide you with a personalized price based on your consumption, ensuring savings and renewable consumption.
Switch to Neos in an instant and join the solar revolution.
